items.title: An options strategy to buy the dip on this volatile chipmaker that recently pulled back
items.description: Options trade Tony Zhang breaks down an options play that bets on Micron jumping following a recent pullback.

items.title: Microsoft earnings are coming Wednesday. Here’s what top analysts expect
items.description: Analysts are overwhelmingly bullish heading into Microsoft's fiscal fourth-quarter earnings.

items.title: Peloton rips higher after UBS says the stock could nearly double
items.description: Improving web traffic and cost-cutting measures could boost shares of Peloton higher from here, according to UBS.

items.title: Novo Nordisk gets a downgrade from Bank of America as Wegovy growth outlook weakens
items.description: The bank downgraded the Danish pharmaceutical giant to neutral from buy and decreased its price target.

items.title: Morgan Stanley raises Nvidia price target, cites ‘exceptional’ AI strength
items.description: Analyst Joseph Moore, who reiterated his overweight rating on the artificial intelligence chip darling, upped his price target on the stock.
